vat.error_text_orgNo: Please enter your Organisational Number in the correct format:
vat.error_text: Please enter your VAT number in the correct format:
vat.hint_CY: 8 numbers followed by a letter, e.g. 12345678X
vat.hint_ES: 1 character (letter or number), followed by 7 numbers, followed by 1 character, e.g. X1234567X
